meanings.definition: To provide financial support for a project or endeavor alongside another party.
meanings.sent1: Our company cofinances the new research initiative with a partner organization.
meanings.sent2: The two companies decided to cofinance the construction of a new community center.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel and the rabbit cofinance the nut-gathering operation in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The sun and the moon cofinance the illumination of the sky during day and night.
meanings.sent5: The siblings cofinance their pet's care by splitting the expenses equally.

meanings.definition: To share the cost of something with another party.
meanings.sent1: She cofinances the monthly rent with her roommate to make it more affordable.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors decided to cofinance the repair of the shared fence between their properties.
meanings.sent3: The cat and the dog cofinance the purchase of a new toy to share.
meanings.sent4: The wind and the rain cofinance the watering of the garden with natural resources.
meanings.sent5: The friends cofinance a road trip by splitting the expenses for gas and accommodation.
